name: NxGn Sports Interactive
description: NxGn Sports Interactive is a tech startup with offices in Ahmedabad (HQ) and Mumbai. The company is a tech startup with gaming, data, e-commerce and blockchain as its four key pillars upon which it’s being built. NxGn‘s current focus is primarily in the gaming space and it operates as a Fantasy Sports & Real Money Gaming space. The company is known for its flagship product: Twelfth Man Twelfth Man is a Fantasy Sports and Real Money Gaming app which launched in April 2020. The app first came into the spotlight when NxGn Sports Interactive roped in the Indian Football Legend and the current captain of the Indian Football team, Sunil Chhetri, as its brand ambassador in May 2020.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
